name: CCTVCAMERA,NVR,DVR&SECURITYSERVICES
0:
”Alexa, show the camera”
”Alexa, show the camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
CMOS are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the CMOS App. With the skill CMOS Camera and Alexa, you can now interact with your CMOS cameras by voice.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your CMOS account* and discover your CMOS cameres. find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to alexa: http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the skill, you will need to create names for you devices, there are two ways to create theses names.

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show the camera"
"Alexa, stop the camera"
